1.title: Chopper RV
1.plot: Dario loves his motorcycle almost as much as he loves his family. Now everyone is hitting the road, but what RV can accommodate the family and the chopper? Will they choose a roofdeck, a porch, or a separate garage?

2.title: Husband vs. Wife
2.plot: Randall is an outdoorsman who is married to Lisa, a city slicker looking for an RV with all the creature comforts of home. Will the chose an RV with a fireplace, a king size bed or massive storage space?

3.title: Family of Eight RV
3.plot: Anthony is a NYC fire fighter who is taking his wife and seven children for a year-long vacation to see the country. Can he find an RV that is big enough to keep them sane, enjoy their vacation and accommodate a homeschooling class of seven?

4.title: Million Dollar RVs
4.plot: Gary and Jeanne are the ultimate tailgaters and are ready to buy an RV and travel wherever their favorite NASCAR driver goes next. Will their love for luxury and their need to tow a racecar of their own break the bank?

imdb.plot outline: Wait until you see the amenities included in some of the world's most decked out RVs. With everything from "slide out" features that make an RV's living space larger to RVs that are designed to go off-road, anything is possible in the land of RV design. Join a new couple each episode as they go shopping for their dream RV.
imdb.title: Buying RVs
plot: Wait until you see the amenities included in some of the world's most decked out RVs. With everything from "slide out" features that make an RV's living space larger to RVs that are designed to go off-road, anything is possible in the land of RV design.
